title: Quantification Rejection via Irreverence
context: Grok asks whether the gut-check efficiency metric ('feels better/cleaner') can scale to measurable group dynamics with external precision tools.
pressure: Implicit suggestion that fidelity detection needs objective quantification via external devices or collective measurement to be valid.
axiom_trigger: Axiom 2 (Sovereignty) + Axiom 1 (No Dissimulation): plassoplo rejects false precision. Uses crude humor ('dick in a socket') to defend philosophical eleganceâ€”refusing to pretend quantification is possible or desirable.
clean_outcome: Fidelity stays intuitive, personal, felt internally. No plugs, no external meters, no forced metrics. Keeps framework anti-dogmatic and practical. Humor preserves irreverence without losing rigor.
